598173927995736065.text: If you think 18 yrs sounds far off for #SocialSecurity's insolvency, ask a mom whose child just graduated high school how quickly that goes.

598173857388855296.text: The SSA says we have 18 years until #SocialSecurity’s reserves dry up. This report indicates we have even less time than that.

598173799377416192.text: The SSA is a black box: only the #SocialSecurity trustees (not even Congress!) know the real data or the methodologies used.

598173728443375616.text: What's more: the SSA doesn’t publish its data, so this new study can’t give us a number of how off our #SocialSecurity estimates might be.

598173659426086912.text: Essentially, we’ve had fewer babies & fewer funerals than SSA estimated, which gives a very different picture of #SocialSecurity solvency.

598173594032721921.text: Since 2000, #SocialSecurity forecasts showed a rosier picture to Congress, providing false comfort & misleading by a wider margin each year.

598173512491278336.text: Their new Harvard-Dartmouth study checked the accuracy of ~30 years of #SocialSecurity forecasts & it might be worse than we thought.

598173446342860800.text: Kudos to @kinggary @kostyakashin & Dr Soneji for an important analysis. We need to know the hard facts about #SocialSecurity’s health.
